info.title: RTG-Portal
info.description: The RTG-Portal API is an interface for selected RTG-Shop customers.

get.description: Testing connection of shop to RTG-Portal and setting shopstatus to active

put.description: reporting request status, if failed or succeed

get.description: Get all supported languages, that has been assigned in the rtg-portal

request_id.description: request_id to identify report request status

dateLimitValue.description: Datefilter value - `default = null = timestamp of last successfull import`

dateLimitOperator.description: Set AND or OR operator for datefilters
